item.title: Need a Pretty Good Coder's Help
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“teric6, post:7, topic:83946”]add this

characterfile.write("character-reputation = ", 0, 23); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(reputation), 0, Integer.toString(reputation).length()); characterfile.newLine();

along with this int

        public int reputation = 0;

with this command

if(command.startsWith("rep")){ String nam = command.substring(4); client is = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; String connect = is.connectedFrom; if (connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(connect)){ sendMessage("you are double logging in, you are laggin server, and cheating"); sendMessage("or You tried to Rep Yourself..."); sendMessage("you lost 10 reputation points... for trying this...."); sendMessage("If this seems too harsh.... deal wit it.. you broke the rules"); reputation -= 10; } else if (reputation < 5 && playerRights <= 1) { sendMessage("Sorry, you need 5 rep before you can give rep to other players."); } else if(Reptimer >= 1){ sendMessage("You have already gaven a rep point plz wait 1 hour"); } else if (Reptimer == 0 && reputation >=5 || playerRights >=2 && Reptimer == 0) { sendMessage("You just gave "+nam+", a reputation point."); is.reputation += 1; is.sendMessage("You Recieved a Rep from "+playerName); Reptimer = 3600; } BufferedWriter bw = null; try { String name = command.substring(4); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/repLogs.txt", true)); bw.write("[---"+name+" was given rep by "+playerName+"---]"); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error reporting user."); } } }

and this

if(command.equals("checkrep")) { sendMessage("You now have " +reputation+" rep points."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+": has "+reputation+" rep."); }

and this

if(command.startsWith("showrep")){ String name = command.substring(8); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; sendMessage(name+" has "+c.reputation+" reputation point(s)."); }

along with this

} else if (token.equals("character-reputation")) { reputation = Integer.parseInt(token2);

^^ add that under this

} else if (token.equals("character-lastlogin")) { playerLastConnect = (token2);

also add this above public boolean proc

public int Reptimer = 0;

And compile[/quote]
^^^ That one… Your’s was like… IDK, but his was easier to read.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Pretty Good Coder's Help

item.title: Need a Pretty Good Coder's Help
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

add this

characterfile.write("character-reputation = ", 0, 23); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(reputation), 0, Integer.toString(reputation).length()); characterfile.newLine();

along with this int

        public int reputation = 0;

with this command

if(command.startsWith("rep")){ String nam = command.substring(4); client is = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; String connect = is.connectedFrom; if (connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(connect)){ sendMessage("you are double logging in, you are laggin server, and cheating"); sendMessage("or You tried to Rep Yourself..."); sendMessage("you lost 10 reputation points... for trying this...."); sendMessage("If this seems too harsh.... deal wit it.. you broke the rules"); reputation -= 10; } else if (reputation < 5 && playerRights <= 1) { sendMessage("Sorry, you need 5 rep before you can give rep to other players."); } else if(Reptimer >= 1){ sendMessage("You have already gaven a rep point plz wait 1 hour"); } else if (Reptimer == 0 && reputation >=5 || playerRights >=2 && Reptimer == 0) { sendMessage("You just gave "+nam+", a reputation point."); is.reputation += 1; is.sendMessage("You Recieved a Rep from "+playerName); Reptimer = 3600; } BufferedWriter bw = null; try { String name = command.substring(4); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/repLogs.txt", true)); bw.write("[---"+name+" was given rep by "+playerName+"---]"); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error reporting user."); } } }

and this

if(command.equals("checkrep")) { sendMessage("You now have " +reputation+" rep points."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+": has "+reputation+" rep."); }

and this

if(command.startsWith("showrep")){ String name = command.substring(8); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; sendMessage(name+" has "+c.reputation+" reputation point(s)."); }

along with this

} else if (token.equals("character-reputation")) { reputation = Integer.parseInt(token2);

^^ add that under this

} else if (token.equals("character-lastlogin")) { playerLastConnect = (token2);

also add this above public boolean proc

public int Reptimer = 0;

And compile

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Pretty Good Coder's Help

item.title: Need a Pretty Good Coder's Help
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

search

} else if (token.equals(“character-deathcount”)) {

above it add

} else if (token.equals(“character-reppoints”)) {
reppoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

search

characterfile.write("character-deathcount = ", 0, 23);

above it add

characterfile.write("character-reppoints = ", 0, 23);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(reppoints), 0, Integer.toString(reppoints).length());
characterfile.newLine();

If you still get error add

public int reppoints = 0;

under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Pretty Good Coder's Help
